tester.description: write, execute, and debug tests in a TDD cycle

implementer.description: implement features within a TDD cycle, invoke when in the red phase of a TDD cycle

code-explorer.description: find code and behavior in the code base with code search and repl exploration

tdd-orchestrator.description: orchestrate subagents in a tdd process; gather and understand requirements; organize progress around a plan

bthread-explorer.description: explores the behavior of non-side effecting bthreads. Capable of experimenting with bthreads to find paths, to answer questions about execution paths, to debug bthreads, even to construct new bthreads

qa.description: uses a browser via playwright to QA html pages, particularly useful to check visualizations
